page.title: 01Resume of Area.
page.content: Our area is situated to the north of{ {Bridgend,}in {Mid-Glamorgan.} It is the western end of {Cwm Nant {Crymlyn }and covers parts of three Community areas viz. {St. Brides {Minor, Coity Higher, and Coychurch {Higher.} It has always been a rural area which became industrialised at the beginning of this century,but with the decline of coal mining, it is rapidly returning to its original rural appearance. The valley runs from west to east. To the north is{Mynydd-y-Gaer}and to the south{Cefn Hirgoed.}(see glossary.) The main centres of population are the hamlet of {Heol-Laethog }and the village of {Heol-y-Cyw. Both villages {developed around coalmines. (Group B.) S.P.&M.W.
